mapper.insert: INSERT INTO wdt_t_task_comments( id, type, task_id, task_item_id, user_id, content, schedule, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{type}, #{taskId}, #{taskItemId}, #{user.id}, #{content}, #{schedule}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE wdt_t_task_comments SET type = #{type}, task_id = #{taskId}, task_item_id = #{taskItemId}, user_id = #{user.id}, content = #{content}, schedule = #{schedule}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: select CONCAT(DATE_FORMAT(c.update_date,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i'),' by ',us.name) from wdt_t_task_comments c left join sys_user us on us.id=c.create_by where c.task_id=#{taskId} ORDER BY c.update_date desc limit 1
